author: Fiach Kelly
title: Varadkar urges people to ‘stay home’ as he announces new restrictions
description: Cabinet is told that increased welfare payments and income support schemes will cost €300m per week for 12 weeks
content:
Taoiseach Leo Varadkar has asked people to stay home if at all possible as he announced new restrictions to help the country tackle the spread of coronavirus. 
Under the new measures, which support those already outlined by the Taoiseach earlier this month, … [+3456 chars]
